summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing concerns about Paul Morris's experience in a professional context. The email emphasizes confidentiality and attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email expressing concerns about Paul Morris's qualifications.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein, who is being consulted regarding Paul Morris.

persons.name: Paul Morris

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein expresses doubt about Paul Morris's experience.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
